title: Bots
body:
Is Riot getting lazy or do they just not care enough to ban bots?

Every single game this morning has had at least one bot sometimes three or four in a game and this has been going on for a very long time, I have no idea why you would even want to use bots either.

replies.body: Bots are banned in waves, so it can take a little while for them to actually get banned, but they so get banned. Usually they are used for levelling accounts so you'll see them in pre 30 games and new 30 ARAMs for the most part. Post 30 you'll rarely see bots at all. I personally have only seen one or two bots in 1000+ norms and 600+ ARAMs.

So after seeing more and more bots in ARAM and hearing the rumours now I know why there are so many bots.

Riot uses them to fill games which is why they don't get banned, at least I know now.
I havn't seen a single bot in over 1000 games so I'd say they are doing a pretty good job

Trying out some new champs in intermediate co-op games, 3 games played, 8 botted champs.
That's right, there were more bots than real people over the 3 games.
Its very easy to spot them when there are 3 of them in your game, they all do the same stuff at the same time; locking in during champ select, leaving in the post lobby, buying items.
You can spot the current scripted version by seeing them all buy boots as a starting item, they never pick up the trinket.
Generally they will go around 0-12 in the game.

I don't really play LoL competitively more for fun so I play ARAM a lot.

I'm ranked 30 and usually always see them in ARAM, at least as Seras said they are banning in waves, just gets frustrating when you have them on you're team and feel sorry for your opponents when they are on their team and you win so easily.
Are you playing in bot games? That is the only place I see them, otherwise in a 5v5 game it is always humans who sometimes script.

The only time I've ever seen bots in a game has been in ARAM when my account was fairly new, and I haven't seen that many complaints elsewhere relating to bots. Since it doesn't affect competitive play I doubt Riot would do much about it, honestly.
